meanings.sent1: Many netizens enjoy browsing websites for information.
meanings.sent2: Netizens often share their thoughts on social media platforms.
meanings.sent3: The netizens found a funny meme and shared it with their friends.
meanings.sent4: In the vast web of the internet, netizens are like explorers seeking knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Netizens are like digital citizens, navigating the online world.

meanings.definition: Netizens: People who participate in online communities.
meanings.sent1: Online forums are filled with netizens discussing various topics.
meanings.sent2: Netizens contribute to the vibrant online discussions in chat rooms.
meanings.sent3: The netizens organized a virtual party to celebrate their online friendship.
meanings.sent4: In the virtual realm, netizens are the social butterflies of the internet.
meanings.sent5: Netizens build virtual communities, connecting with others worldwide.

meanings.definition: Netizens: Individuals who engage in online activities.
meanings.sent1: Many netizens enjoy playing online games with friends.
meanings.sent2: Netizens shop online for various products and services.
meanings.sent3: The netizens decided to have a virtual movie night together.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, netizens are the pioneers of online interactions.
meanings.sent5: Netizens embrace the digital world, exploring new online experiences.
